Plot: A kid dreams of playing professional basketball in order to escape his dead-end job, living in the suburbs, his bossy older brother and running his Mom's ping pong classes.
Title: Ping Pong Playa
Actors: Jimmy Tsai, Andrew Vo, Khary Payton, Jim Lau
tomatoConsensus: A gentle, light, kid friendly comedy about a Chinese-American hoopster turned ping pong pro, Playa is a charming but considerable digression from director Jessica Yu's previous works.
